p: Melatonin is another drug that has been proposed as a potential anti-inflammatory drug to relieve the symptoms of SARS-CoV-2 infection. Viral infections cause injury of the immune system that is commonly associated with oxidative stress and damage of organs [ 133]. Melatonin is an old biogenic amine for treating sleep disturbances and circadian rhythm. It has an antioxidant effect and has been previously encouraged to be used for Ebola viral infection [ 134]. As suggested by ChengÂ et al., melatonin could reduce the clinical symptoms of SARS-CoV-2 infection and prolong the survival time for the patient.
